description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help the flowers grow as you practice answering math problems. Learning math can be fun. As math problems are shown at the top of the screen, position the rain cloud over the flower pot with the correct answer. It may seem simple, but it is still way better than flash cards.
